body:
=== SYSTEM DIRECTIVE: ADOPT EXISTING REPOSITORY ===
Command: octeams adopt https://github.com/schoolofai/mixaroo-lite.git
Product: mixaroo-lite
Mode: Existing codebase â€” analyze, strategize, staff, grow

CONTEXT: This repo has been cloned and scaffolded with .team/ infrastructure.
Read .team/conventions.md for the codebase analysis.

EXECUTE THESE STEPS IN ORDER:
1. ANALYZE    â€” Read codebase structure and .team/conventions.md
2. ACKNOWLEDGE â€” Confirm analysis, transition phase: setup â†’ discovery
3. ASSESS     â€” Architecture, tech debt, market positioning
4. STRATEGY   â€” GTM strategy for existing product â†’ /work/deliverables/gtm-strategy.md
5. PREFLIGHT  â€” Pre-flight checklist â†’ /work/deliverables/preflight-checklist.md
6. PROPOSE    â€” Team composition â†’ MUST write .team/team-proposal.json
7. READY ACK  â€” Send completion message to human inbox using host cycle format

For this host lifecycle cycle, execute steps 1-7 in ONE uninterrupted pass.
Do NOT pause waiting for intermediate CEO review before sending READY ACK.

*** CRITICAL REQUIREMENT ***
Step 6 MUST create .team/team-proposal.json matching this EXACT schema:
{
  "status": "proposed",
  "proposed_at": "2026-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "rationale": "Why this team composition was chosen...",
  "roles": [
    {
      "role": "developer",
      "count": 1,
      "description": "Core backend API development",
      "soul_md": "# Developer Agent\n\nYou are a backend developer..."
    },
    {
      "role": "qa",
      "count": 1,
      "description": "Testing and quality assurance",
      "soul_md": "# QA Agent\n\nYou are a QA engineer..."
    }
  ],
  "prerequisites": {
    "blocking": ["GitHub repository access"],
    "before_launch": ["Hosting", "Domain"],
    "nice_to_have": ["Analytics"]
  }
}

REQUIRED FIELDS (the CLI validates with Zod â€” wrong field names will FAIL):
- "status": "proposed", "proposed_at": ISO timestamp, "rationale": string
- "roles": array with "role", "count", "description", "soul_md" (min 50 chars)
- DO NOT use "team", "proposal_date", "agent_id", "focus", "skills"
After writing required artifacts, commit and push them to mirror:
- git add /work/deliverables/gtm-strategy.md /work/deliverables/preflight-checklist.md
- git add .team/team-proposal.json .team/phase.json .team/comms/ .team/activity/ .team/roster/
- git commit && git push origin main

YOU DO NOT SPIN UP AGENTS OR ASSEMBLE THE TEAM.
The host CLI performs review, approval, and assembly.
Your ONLY job is to write deliverables + proposal and send READY ack.

READY ACK MUST include:
- type=proposal_ready
- cycle_id=<value provided by host in cycle contract>
- summary=<short artifact summary>
Send READY ACK using octeams msg (do NOT edit inbox JSONL files directly).
*** END CRITICAL ***
=== END DIRECTIVE ===

=== HOST REVIEW CYCLE CONTRACT ===
cycle_id=adopt:mixaroo-lite:2026-02-20T17:28:10.631Z:8dc096e0
mode=adopt

When all required deliverables and team proposal are ready:
1. Send a message to human inbox that includes:
   - type=proposal_ready
   - cycle_id=adopt:mixaroo-lite:2026-02-20T17:28:10.631Z:8dc096e0
   - short summary of produced artifacts
2. Keep proposal status as "proposed" until host approval.
3. READY ack is allowed only after required deliverables + proposal for this exact cycle_id are regenerated, committed, and pushed together.
4. Never send READY if proposal refreshed but any required deliverable is stale from a prior cycle.

READY ACK FORMAT (copy exactly):
type=proposal_ready
cycle_id=adopt:mixaroo-lite:2026-02-20T17:28:10.631Z:8dc096e0
summary=<artifact summary>
Send this via octeams msg to human inbox. Never write raw lines directly to JSONL files.
=== END HOST REVIEW CYCLE CONTRACT ===

*** END CRITICAL ***
=== END DIRECTIVE ===

=== HOST REVIEW CYCLE CONTRACT ===
cycle_id=adopt:mixaroo-lite:2026-02-20T17:31:34.646Z:6b47d090
mode=adopt

When all required deliverables and team proposal are ready:
1. Send a message to human inbox that includes:
   - type=proposal_ready
   - cycle_id=adopt:mixaroo-lite:2026-02-20T17:31:34.646Z:6b47d090
   - short summary of produced artifacts
2. Keep proposal status as "proposed" until host approval.
3. READY ack is allowed only after required deliverables + proposal for this exact cycle_id are regenerated, committed, and pushed together.
4. Never send READY if proposal refreshed but any required deliverable is stale from a prior cycle.

READY ACK FORMAT (copy exactly):
type=proposal_ready
cycle_id=adopt:mixaroo-lite:2026-02-20T17:31:34.646Z:6b47d090
summary=<artifact summary>
Send this via octeams msg to human inbox. Never write raw lines directly to JSONL files.
=== END HOST REVIEW CYCLE CONTRACT ===

=== SYSTEM NOTIFICATION: TEAM ASSEMBLED ===
The CEO has approved your team proposal.
The octeams CLI has:
  1. Accepted team-proposal.json (status â†’ "accepted")
  2. Written SOUL.md files for each role
  3. Started all agent containers
  4. Agents are registering in the roster

ACTION REQUIRED:
- Transition to the PLANNING phase
- Decompose the product spec into tasks on the board (.team/board/)
- Assign tasks to team members based on their roles
- The team is ready and waiting for work
=== END NOTIFICATION ===
Status check after lock cleanup: reply with current phase and active blockers.
health check after tui cleanup

status ping after chat lock test
TASK-004 and TASK-005 done (47 tests, all green). Ready to start TASK-006 (config tests) and TASK-007 (CLI integration tests) but both are in backlog. Can you move them to ready?

=== SYSTEM DIRECTIVE: ADOPT EXISTING REPOSITORY ===
Command: octeams adopt https://github.com/schoolofai/mixaroo-lite.git
Product: mixaroo-lite
Mode: Existing codebase â€” analyze, strategize, staff, grow

CONTEXT: This repo has been cloned and scaffolded with .team/ infrastructure.
Read .team/conventions.md for the codebase analysis.

EXECUTE THESE STEPS IN ORDER:
1. ANALYZE    â€” Read codebase structure and .team/conventions.md
2. ACKNOWLEDGE â€” Confirm analysis, transition phase: setup â†’ discovery
3. ASSESS     â€” Architecture, tech debt, market positioning
4. STRATEGY   â€” GTM strategy for existing product â†’ /work/deliverables/gtm-strategy.md
5. PREFLIGHT  â€” Pre-flight checklist â†’ /work/deliverables/preflight-checklist.md
6. PROPOSE    â€” Team composition â†’ MUST write .team/team-proposal.json
7. READY ACK  â€” Send completion message to human inbox using host cycle format

For this host lifecycle cycle, execute steps 1-7 in ONE uninterrupted pass.
Do NOT pause waiting for intermediate CEO review before sending READY ACK.

*** CRITICAL REQUIREMENT ***
Step 6 MUST create .team/team-proposal.json matching this EXACT schema:
{
  "status": "proposed",
  "proposed_at": "2026-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
  "rationale": "Why this team composition was chosen...",
  "roles": [
    {
      "role": "developer",
      "count": 1,
      "description": "Core backend API development",
      "soul_md": "# Developer Agent\n\nYou are a developer. Code-first mindset...\n## Core Principle\nEvery task = source files...",
      "agents_md": "# Operating Rules\n\n## Work Loop\n1. git pull\n2. octeams inbox\n3. If current task: write code...\n\n## Git Protocol\n- Feature branches: feat/TASK-NNN-slug\n- Commit: [developer-N] TASK-NNN: description\n\n## JSON Guardian\n- validate-team before handoff...",
      "identity": { "name": "CodeSmith", "emoji": "ðŸ’»", "vibe": "Methodical and thorough" },
      "model_tier": "standard",
      "thinking": "low",
      "tool_profile": "coding",
      "memory_seeds": ["Stack: TypeScript + React", "Deploy target: Vercel"]
    },
    {
      "role": "qa",
      "count": 1,
      "description": "Testing and quality assurance",
      "soul_md": "# QA Agent\n\nYou ensure quality. Thorough, detail-oriented...",
      "agents_md": "# Operating Rules\n\n## Work Loop\n1. git pull\n2. octeams inbox\n3. Review protocol: checkout branch, verify criteria...\n\n## Merge Rules\n- QA merges to main, not developer...",
      "tool_profile": "review"
    }
  ],
  "prerequisites": {
    "blocking": ["GitHub repository access"],
    "before_launch": ["Hosting", "Domain"],
    "nice_to_have": ["Analytics"]
  }
}

REQUIRED FIELDS (the CLI validates with Zod â€” wrong field names will FAIL):
- "status": "proposed", "proposed_at": ISO timestamp, "rationale": string
- "roles": array with "role", "count", "description", "soul_md" (min 50 chars, persona only)
- "agents_md": operating rules (min 50 chars, workflows/protocols)
- DO NOT use "team", "proposal_date", "agent_id", "focus", "skills"

OPTIONAL FIELDS per role (defaults provided if omitted):
- "heartbeat_md", "tools_md", "user_md"
- "identity": { "name", "emoji", "vibe" }
- "model_tier": "fast" | "standard" | "deep"
- "thinking": "high" | "low" | "off"
- "tool_profile": "read_only" | "coding" | "review" | "full"
- "memory_seeds": ["project notes"]

WORKSPACE FILE SEPARATION (NEW):
Each role can now specify separate content for different OpenClaw workspace files:

REQUIRED:
- "soul_md": PERSONA ONLY â€” who this agent is, their mindset, tone, philosophy.
  DO NOT include workflow steps, CLI commands, or git protocols here.
- "agents_md": OPERATING RULES â€” step-by-step workflows, heartbeat protocol,
  task lifecycle, git branching, commit format, CLI commands, JSON Guardian.

OPTIONAL (defaults provided if omitted):
- "heartbeat_md": Custom heartbeat checklist
- "tools_md": Environment-specific notes
- "user_md": CEO/user context
- "identity": { "name": "...", "emoji": "...", "vibe": "..." }
- "model_tier": "fast" | "standard" | "deep"
- "thinking": "high" | "low" | "off"
- "tool_profile": "read_only" | "coding" | "review" | "full"
- "memory_seeds": ["project-specific notes to remember"]

RULE: Procedural content (what to DO) â†’ agents_md
      Identity content (who to BE) â†’ soul_md

After writing required artifacts, commit and push them to mirror:
- git add /work/deliverables/gtm-strategy.md /work/deliverables/preflight-checklist.md
- git add .team/team-proposal.json .team/phase.json .team/comms/ .team/activity/ .team/roster/
- git commit && git push origin main

YOU DO NOT SPIN UP AGENTS OR ASSEMBLE THE TEAM.
The host CLI performs review, approval, and assembly.
Your ONLY job is to write deliverables + proposal and send READY ack.

READY ACK MUST include:
- type=proposal_ready
- cycle_id=<value provided by host in cycle contract>
- summary=<short artifact summary>
Send READY ACK using octeams msg (do NOT edit inbox JSONL files directly).
*** END CRITICAL ***
=== END DIRECTIVE ===

=== HOST REVIEW CYCLE CONTRACT ===
cycle_id=adopt:mixaroo-lite:2026-02-22T19:10:38.077Z:2d4acd7f
mode=adopt

When all required deliverables and team proposal are ready:
1. Send a message to human inbox that includes:
   - type=proposal_ready
   - cycle_id=adopt:mixaroo-lite:2026-02-22T19:10:38.077Z:2d4acd7f
   - short summary of produced artifacts
2. Keep proposal status as "proposed" until host approval.
3. READY ack is allowed only after required deliverables + proposal for this exact cycle_id are regenerated, committed, and pushed together.
4. Never send READY if proposal refreshed but any required deliverable is stale from a prior cycle.

READY ACK FORMAT (copy exactly):
type=proposal_ready
cycle_id=adopt:mixaroo-lite:2026-02-22T19:10:38.077Z:2d4acd7f
summary=<artifact summary>
Send this via octeams msg to human inbox. Never write raw lines directly to JSONL files.
=== END HOST REVIEW CYCLE CONTRACT ===

=== SYSTEM NOTIFICATION: TEAM ASSEMBLED ===
The CEO has approved your team proposal.
The octeams CLI has:
  1. Accepted team-proposal.json (status â†’ "accepted")
  2. Written SOUL.md files for each role
  3. Started all agent containers
  4. Agents are registering in the roster

ACTION REQUIRED:
- Transition to the PLANNING phase
- Decompose the product spec into tasks on the board (.team/board/)
- Assign tasks to team members based on their roles
- The team is ready and waiting for work
=== END NOTIFICATION ===

TASK-019 and TASK-020 both in review. README polished with demo GIF placeholder, CI badge, contributing guidelines, and coming-soon features. All 5 launch docs reviewed â€” removed stale macOS-only references everywhere (HN, Twitter, CHANGELOG). Also fixed roleâ†’required_role field naming in all new board tasks (TASK-015 through TASK-022) which was blocking claims. Validation clean.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-016 transition ready -> review. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-019 transition review -> done. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-020 transition review -> done. Lead routing required.

TASK-021 QA complete: playlist persistence (TASK-015) reviewed and passed. Added 11 edge-case tests covering corrupted JSON, empty dirs, unicode prompts, empty songs, non-JSON files, partial ID matching, and sort order. All 143 tests pass. Moved to review for your approval.

TASK-022 QA complete: error handling (TASK-016) reviewed and passed. Added 18 edge-case tests covering null/undefined/numeric errors, all MixarooError subclasses, parseAPIError categorization, displayError robustness, and --verbose flag. All 174 tests pass. Both TASK-021 and TASK-022 now in review for your approval.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-015 transition review -> done. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-017 transition backlog -> review. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-021 transition review -> done. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-022 transition backlog -> ready. Lead routing required.

TASK-023 QA complete: history command (TASK-017) reviewed and passed. Added 13 edge-case tests covering corrupted files, unicode/boundary prompts, getRecentHistory edge values, MAX_HISTORY cap behavior, timestamp format, and file integrity. All 195 tests pass.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-016 transition review -> done. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-022 transition ready -> done. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-023 transition unknown -> review. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-016 transition review -> done. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-017 transition review -> done. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-018 transition backlog -> review. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-022 transition ready -> done. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-023 transition unknown -> done. Lead routing required.

TASK-024 QA complete: shell completions (TASK-018) reviewed and passed. Created QA task and added 11 edge-case tests covering shell name normalization, invalid inputs, and content validation for all three shells. All 214 tests pass.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-017 transition review -> done. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-018 transition backlog -> review. Lead routing required.
[wake-router] Missing task.handoff for TASK-023 transition review -> done. Lead routing required.
